ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Have you ever used cannabis?
Which of the following best captures when you last used cannabis?
Notes: 1 = over a year ago; 2= 9-12 months ago; 3= 6-9 months ago; 4= 3-6 months ago; 5= 1-3 months ago; 6= less than 1 month ago; 7= last week; 8= this week; 9= yesterday; 10= today; 11= I am currently high; 999= Missing

ElementDescription: How high are you right now?
Notes: 0 = I am not at all high; 1 = I am a little bit high; 2 = I am moderately high; 3 = I am very high; 4 = I am extremely high; 999 = Missing

ElementDescription: Which of the following best captures the average frequency you currently use cannabis?
Notes: 0=I do not use cannabis; 1= less than once a year; 2=once a year; 3=once every 3-6 months (2-4 times/yr); 4=once every 2 months (6 times/yr); 5= once a month (12 times/yr); 6=2-3 times a month; 7=once a week; 8=twice a week; 9=3-4 times a week; 10=5-6 times a week; 11=once a day; 12=more than once a day; 999=Missing

ElementDescription: Which of the following best captures how long you have been using cannabis at this frequency?
Notes: 1=less than a month; 2=1-3 months; 3=3-6 months; 4=6-9 months; 5= 9-12 months; 6=1-2 years; 7=2-3 years; 8=3-5 years; 9=5-10 years; 10=10-15 years; 11=15-20 years; 12=more than 20 years; 999=Missing

ElementDescription: Before the period of time you indicated above, how frequently did you use cannabis?
Notes: 0=I do not use cannabis; 1= less than once a year; 2=once a year; 3=once every 3-6 months (2-4 times/yr); 4=once every 2 months (6 times/yr); 5= once a month (12 times/yr); 6=2-3 times a month; 7=once a week; 8=twice a week; 9=3-4 times a week; 10=5-6 times a week; 11=once a day; 12=more than once a day; 999=Missing

ElementDescription: How many days of the past week did you use cannabis?
Notes: 0 = 0 days; 1 = 1 day; 2 = 2 days; 3 = 3 days; 4 = 4 days; 5 = 5 days; 6 = 6 days; 7 = 7 days; 999 = Missing

ElementDescription: Approximately how many days of the past month did you use cannabis?
Which of the following best captures the number of times you have used cannabis in your entire life?
Notes: 1=1-5 times in my life; 2=6-10 times in my life; 3=11-50 times in my life; 4=51-100 times in my life; 5=101-500 times in my life; 6=501-1000 times in my life; 7=1001-2000 times in my life; 8=2001-5000 times in my life; 9=5001-10,000 times in my life; 10=More than 10,000 times in my life; 999=Missing

ElementDescription: Which of the following best captures your pattern of cannabis use throughout the week?
Notes: 0=I do not use cannabis at all; 1=I only use cannabis on the weekends; 2=I only use cannabis on weekdays; 3=I use cannabis on weekends and weekdays; 999=Missing

ElementDescription: How many hours after waking up do you typically first use cannabis?
Notes: 0= I do not use cannabis at all; 1= 12-18 hours after waking up; 2= 9-12 hours after waking up; 3= 6-9 hours after waking up; 4= 3-6 hours after waking up; 5= 1-3 hours after waking up;  6= within 1 hour of waking up; 7= within 1/2 hour of waking up; 8= immediately upon waking up; 999= Missing

ElementDescription: How many times a day, on a typical weekday, do you use cannabis?
How many times a day, on a typical weekend, do you use cannabis?
What is the primary method you use to ingest cannabis?
Notes: 0 = I do not use cannabis; 1= Joints; 2= Blunts (cigar sized joints); 3= Hand Pipe; 4= Bong (water pipe); 5= Hookah; 6= Vaporizer (e.g., Volcano, Vape pen); 7= Edibles; 8= Other; 999= Missing

ElementDescription: Other primary method to ingest cannabis
Which of the following other methods to ingest cannabis do you use regularly (at least 25% of the time you use cannabis)?
Notes: 0=  None; 1= Joints; 2= Blunts (cigar sized joints); 3= Hand pipe; 4= Bong (water pipe); 5= Hookah; 6= Vaporizer (e.g., Volcano, Vape pen); 7= Edibles;  8= Other; 999= Missing

ElementDescription: Other method to ingest cannabis regularly
What is the primary form of cannabis you use?
Notes: 0= None; 1= Marijuana; 2= Concentrates (e.g., Oil, Wax, Shatter, Butane Hash Oil, Dabs); 3= Edibles; 4= Other; 999= Missing

ElementDescription: Other primary form of cannabis use
What other forms of cannabis do you use regularly (at least 25% of the time you use cannabis)?
Notes: 0= None; 1= Marijuana; 2= Concentrates (e.g., Oil, Wax, Shatter, Butane Hash Oil, Dabs); 3= Edibles; 4= Other

ElementDescription: Other form of cannabis do you use regularly
In a typical session, how much marijuana do you personally use?
On a typical day you use marijuana, how much do you personally use?
In a typical week you use marijuana, how much marijuana do you personally use?
On a typical day you use marijuana, how many sessions do you have?
What is the average THC content of the marijuana you typically use?
In a typical session you use cannabis concentrates, how many hits do you personally take?
On a typical day you use cannabis concentrates, how many hits do you personally take?
How many hits of cannabis concentrates did you personally take yesterday?
On a typical day you use cannabis concentrates, how many sessions do you have?
What is the average THC content of the concentrates you typically use?
When you eat edibles how many milligrams of THC do you personall ingest in a typical session?
What is your current age?
How many years in total have you used cannabis?
How old were you when you FIRST tried cannabis?
Has there been any time in your life when you used cannabis regularly (2 or more times per month for 6 months or longer)?
How old were you when you FIRST STARTED using cannabis regularly (2 or more times/month)?
Has there been any time in your life when you used cannabis on a daily or near daily basis for 6 months or longer?
How old were you when you FIRST STARTED using cannabis on a daily or near daily basis?
Which of the following best captures the average frequency that you used cannabis before the age of 16?
Notes: 0= more than once a day; 1= once a day; 2= 5-6 times a week; 3= 3-4 times a week; 4= twice a week; 5= once a week; 6= 2-3 times a month; 7= once a month; 8= once every 2 months (6 times/yr.); 9= once every 3-6 months (2-4 times/yr.); 10= once a year; 11= less than once a year; 12= never

ElementDescription: Do you have a physician's recommendation to use cannabis for medicinal purposes?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes; 2= Yes, but I use it for both medicinal and recreational purposes

ElementDescription: Which medical condition(s) do you use cannabis for?
What percentage of the time do you use cannabis for recreational (rather than medicinal) purposes?
Have you in the past had a disease or illness you believe was caused or aggravated by your smoking marijuana?
Do you have any symptoms now that you believe are caused by your smoking marijuana?
Do you have a disease or illness now that you believe is caused or aggravated by your smoking marijuana?
